meta.title: An Overview of the Raute Region

nodes.body: The Raute are an ethnic group of Nepal who speak a Tibeto-Burman language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 518 people speak Raute as a mother tongue and there are 658 ethnic Raute. (Mark Turin – June 01, 2004)
nodes.title: An Overview of the Raute Region
